sqlMap.select: SELECT name,key,category_id FROM s_productType ORDER BY sort ASC
SELECT name,key from s_hospitaltype ORDER BY sort ASC
SELECT DISTINCT id AS countryid,title AS country,parentid AS cityid FROM t_area ta INNER JOIN t_hospital_entity th ON th.area = ta.id WHERE th.city IS NOT NULL AND th.is_cooperate=1
SELECT id,SUBSTR(title, 0, length(title)-1 ) AS title,area_code,city_code,parentid FROM t_area WHERE id IN (SELECT city FROM t_hospital_entity WHERE is_cooperate=1) ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT DISTINCT tb.id AS brandId, tb.name AS brandName, th.city FROM t_brand tb INNER JOIN t_car_services tcs ON tcs.brand_id = tb.id INNER JOIN t_hospital_entity th ON th.csid = tcs.csid

SELECT p.pid,p.pno,p.name AS pname,p.sex, product_brief,p.vip,p.doc_report, p.product_desc, NVL(p.img,'morenProduct.jpg') AS img,p.product_type,p.pay_type, NVL(p.shop_price,0) AS shop_price, NVL(p.market_price,0) AS market_price, NVL(TO_CHAR(p.discount * 10, '99.9'),0) AS discount, DECODE(p.product_type,0,0,tcs.csid) as csid, DECODE(p.product_type,0,0,tb.id) as brandId, DECODE(p.product_type,0,p.brand_name,tb.name) as bname FROM s_product p LEFT JOIN (select distinct pid,csid from s_product_entity) spe ON spe.pid = p.pid LEFT JOIN t_car_services tcs ON tcs.csid = spe.csid LEFT JOIN t_brand tb ON tb.id = tcs.brand_id WHERE p.status = 2
SELECT spt.pid, sp.name, sp.key, sp.category_id FROM s_product_type spt INNER JOIN s_productType sp ON sp.key = spt.key
SELECT pid,label,main_title,sub_title1,sub_title2,car_img FROM s_product_cardimg

SELECT pt.pid, sl.model_name, sl.context, sl.sex, sty.type_name FROM s_product_setmeal pt, t_setmealinfo sl, t_setmealtype sty WHERE sty.id = sl.type_id AND sl.id = pt.meal_id ORDER BY sty.sort ASC ,sl.sort ASC

SELECT b.esid, b.csid, b.name AS ename, b.address, b.bus_line,sh.name AS typeName, b.checkup_time, b.rest_time, b.province, b.city, b.area, c.name AS bname, TO_CHAR(b.description) AS description, nvl(b.tel,'400-661-6669') AS tel, b.lgt, b.lat, (SELECT title FROM t_area WHERE id = b.province ) AS provinceName, (SELECT title FROM t_area WHERE id = b.city ) AS cityName, (SELECT title FROM t_area WHERE id = b.area ) AS countyName, (SELECT img_url FROM t_entity_picture WHERE esid = b.esid AND model_flag = 0 AND ROWNUM = 1) AS img FROM t_hospital_entity b LEFT JOIN (SELECT csid,brand_id,key FROM t_car_services) cs ON b.csid = cs.csid LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,name FROM t_brand) c ON cs.brand_id = c.id LEFT JOIN s_hospitaltype sh ON sh.key = cs.key WHERE b.is_cooperate = 1
SELECT esid,img_url AS environmentImg FROM t_entity_picture WHERE model_flag = 1
SELECT id AS countryid,title AS country,parentid AS cityid FROM t_area ta INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT area, city FROM t_hospital_entity WHERE city = #city# AND is_cooperate=1) th ON th.area = ta.id

SELECT DISTINCT tb.id AS brandId, tb.name AS brandName, th.city FROM t_brand tb INNER JOIN t_car_services tcs ON tcs.brand_id = tb.id INNER JOIN (select csid,city from t_hospital_entity where city = #city#) th ON th.csid = tcs.csid

SELECT p.pid,p.pno,p.name AS pname,p.sex, product_brief,p.vip,p.doc_report, p.product_desc, NVL(p.img,'morenProduct.jpg') AS img,p.product_type,p.pay_type, NVL(p.shop_price,0) AS shop_price, NVL(p.market_price,0) AS market_price, NVL(TO_CHAR(p.discount * 10, '99.9'),0) AS discount, DECODE(p.product_type,0,0,tcs.csid) as csid, DECODE(p.product_type,0,0,tb.id) as brandId, DECODE(p.product_type,0,p.brand_name,tb.name) as bname FROM s_product p LEFT JOIN (select distinct pid,csid from s_product_entity) spe ON spe.pid = p.pid LEFT JOIN t_car_services tcs ON tcs.csid = spe.csid LEFT JOIN t_brand tb ON tb.id = tcs.brand_id WHERE p.status = 2 AND p.pid = #pid# AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT spt.pid, sp.name, sp.key, sp.category_id FROM s_product_type spt INNER JOIN s_productType sp ON sp.key = spt.key WHERE spt.pid = #pid#
SELECT pid,label,main_title,sub_title1,sub_title2,car_img FROM s_product_cardimg WHERE pid = #pid# AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT pt.pid, sl.model_name, sl.context, sl.sex, sty.type_name FROM s_product_setmeal pt, t_setmealinfo sl, t_setmealtype sty WHERE sty.id = sl.type_id AND sl.id = pt.meal_id AND pt.pid = #pid# ORDER BY sty.sort ASC ,sl.sort ASC

SELECT b.esid, b.csid, b.name AS ename, b.address, b.bus_line,sh.name AS typeName, b.checkup_time, b.rest_time, b.province, b.city, b.area, c.name AS bname, TO_CHAR(b.description) AS description, nvl(b.tel,'400-661-6669') AS tel, b.lgt, b.lat, (SELECT title FROM t_area WHERE id = b.province ) AS provinceName, (SELECT title FROM t_area WHERE id = b.city ) AS cityName, (SELECT title FROM t_area WHERE id = b.area ) AS countyName, (SELECT img_url FROM t_entity_picture WHERE esid = b.esid AND model_flag = 0 AND ROWNUM = 1) AS img FROM t_hospital_entity b LEFT JOIN (SELECT csid,brand_id,key FROM t_car_services) cs ON b.csid = cs.csid LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,name FROM t_brand) c ON cs.brand_id = c.id LEFT JOIN s_hospitaltype sh ON sh.key = cs.key WHERE b.is_cooperate = 1 AND b.esid = #esid#
SELECT esid,img_url AS environmentImg FROM t_entity_picture WHERE model_flag = 1 AND esid = #esid#
SELECT pid, esid FROM s_product_entity
SELECT esid FROM s_product_entity WHERE pid = #pid#
